Detailed Description

Obsolete - the class Menu, which uses the SubMenuAction, has been replaced by the classes ItemMenu and ItemTree.

May contain a menu-accessor and allows together with the class AbstractActionMenuAccessor the implementation of a menu-hierarchy. When an accessor-action is triggered inside a menu, the current accessor of the menu is replaced by the accessor from accessor-action, which means traversing down the menu-hierarchy.

Parameters:
dispatcher Dispatcher which will be informed about property changes of the action. It is recommended always to specify a dispatcher.
text Text of the action.
icon Icon of the action represented by a bitmap.
enabled Specifies whether the action is enabled. Usually actions which are not enabled may not be executed.
